#summary Syntax of the map description file

= Introduction =

This document describes the format of the map description file.

= File Name =

Map description files have a name composed of the name of the adventure, in camel case, and extension '.game'. For example: 
{{{
   AdventureLand.game
}}}

When displaying the name of the adventure, TAC will split the words at each uppercase letter.
